    • getRandomPosition

      void initializeMap()
      Initializes the map.

    • getUpperBoundaries

      int[] getUpperBoundaries()
      Gets the upper limits of the map.
      Returns:
      Int[] representing max X coord and max Y coord.

      Places unit on the map.
      Parameters:
      unit - Unit to place.

    • getMap

      IUnit[][] getMap()
      Gets the current state of the map.
      Returns:
      IUnit[][] representing map of units.

    • removeUnitFromMap

      Removes unit from the map.
      Parameters:
      unit - Unit to remove.

    • moveUnitOnMap

      void moveUnitOnMap​(int[] from, int[] to)
      Moves unit on the map.
      Parameters:
      from - Position from which move the unit.
      to - Position to which move the unit.

      Gets the list of all units.
      Returns:
      List representing all units.

      Checks the accessibility of positions.
      Parameters:
      positions - Positions to check.
      Returns:
      List representing accessible positions.

    • isPositionAccessible

      boolean isPositionAccessible​(int[] position)
      Checks if position is accessible.
      Parameters:
      position - Position to check.
      Returns:
      Boolean value representing whether position is accessible or not.

    • isPositionWithinMap

      boolean isPositionWithinMap​(int[] position)
      Checks if position is within the map.
      Parameters:
      position - Position to check.
      Returns:
      Boolean value representing whether position is within map or not.

    • isPositionWithinMap

      boolean isPositionWithinMap​(int x, int y)
      Checks if position is within the map.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate to check.
      y - Y coordinate to check.
      Returns:
      Boolean value representing whether position is within map or not.
